entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Old Crow Airport 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
Temperature: -14.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -17.9°C
Wind: ENE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 8.
